= Web = 
----
== google ==
{{{
*web google <number> <text>
}}}
 * Google search: you specify number of results 1-10 in <number> and the text to find: <text> . Bot will return as much results as he found (due to <number>).
*Example:*
{{{
user: *web google 1 agsxmpp
bot: AG-Software - agsXMPP SDKAG-Software - , open-source cross platform XMPP Library.
www.ag-software.de/content/agsxmpp/ 
}}}
----
== xep ==
{{{
*web xep <tip>
}}}
 * A XEP (XMPP Extensions Protocol) search (see [http://xmpp.org/extensions]) by a piece of text (number) - <tip>
*Example:*
{{{
user: *web xep 99
bot: XEP 0099:
IQ Query Action Protocol Type: Standards Track Status: Deferred
http://www.xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0099.html

user:*web xep iq query
bot: XEP 0099:
IQ Query Action Protocol Type: Standards Track Status: Deferred
http://www.xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0099.html
}}}
----
